original_text: This will allow us to identify and address potential issues before they significantly impact our ability to reach our audience.
units: This will allow us to identify and address potential issues before they significantly impact our ability to reach our audience .
address potential issues before they significantly impact our ability to reach our audience

original_text: This widget should display reputation scores over time, allowing us to easily identify patterns, track improvements resulting from any remediation efforts, and proactively detect potential long-term issues.
units: This widget should display reputation scores over time , allowing us to easily identify patterns , track improvements resulting from any remediation efforts , and proactively detect potential long - term issues .
proactively detect potential long - term issues

original_text: To enable this visualization, the system will need to store and aggregate the reputation data collected from the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster on an ongoing basis.
units: To enable this visualization , the system will need to store and aggregate the reputation data collected from the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster on an ongoing basis .
aggregate the reputation data collected from the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster on an ongoing basis
